ComicInfo.Summary: Alex is looking for answers. He must find the Red Hood to know why she attacked his father. Meanwhile, the Children of Judas, a bunch of wild kids you wouldn't like to meet, are ready to get rid of the vampire hunters once and for all. Can Alex and the Red Hood stop the kids without getting killed? Maybe--if they don't kill each other first!
ComicInfo.Title: The Children of Judas, Part Two: Behind the Hood
